main.name: Panisara Lertrungwichian
main.description: Originally from Thailand, I have been studying and working in the US for six years in pursuit of knowledge and long term employment.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Integrated Human Biology
education.description: Spent time in laboratory setting with knowledge of sterilization techniques, maintaining and preparing stock reagents, tissue culturing, XTT assay (cell viability), data analysis, collaboration, and word and excel software.
Initial introduction to hard science courses with labs

research.lab: Messner Lab, Bastyr University (Basic science department)
research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description:
- Created and performed different treatment conditions on iron overloaded rat hepatocyte epithelial cells, T51B cells.
- Detected cell viability and determined concentration-dependent of Tetrahydrocurcumin (THC) and curcumin.
- Accurately utilized spectrophotometry and analyzed data using excel software.

research.lab: Messner Lab, Bastyr University (Basic science department)
research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description:
- Prepared and maintained stock reagents.
- Performed MCF-7 cells plating, maintenance, and counting in culture dishes.
- Performed cytotoxicity test and analyzed collected data using excel software.
- Collaborated with other undergraduate researchers.

research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description:
- Proposed research project.
- Created a grant proposal.
- Designed a step by step research project to determine cytotoxic effect of alpha-mangostin and/or *Tinospora* extracts on human colon cancer, HCT 116, cells.

research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description:
- Gathered data collected from previous scientific papers.
- Analyzed statistical values. 
- Presented a secondary analysis on association between triglyceride level and heart disease "The Association between Triglyceride Level, body Mass Index Risk Factors and Heart Disease in Middle-aged Adults".

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
